items.sentence: You don\'t usually do that by yourself, do you?
Tom and Mary weren\'t invited to John\'s party.
Is it too much to hope that you\'ll forgive me?
It looks like you\'re not having much fun here.
We don\'t have enough money now, unfortunately.
We don\'t have time to look for that right now.
We don\'t know for sure Tom is still in Boston.
Tom hasn\'t been able to contact Mary by phone.
Tom hasn\'t yet told us what he wants us to do.
Tom and Mary built a snow fort in the backyard.
Tom and Mary could learn a lot from each other.
Tom and Mary got married about three years ago.
Tom and Mary got married and settled in Boston.
Tom and Mary grow leaf lettuce in their garden.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want me here.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want surgery.
Tom made me swear that I wouldn\'t tell anyone.
It\'s very cloudy. I think it\'s going to rain.
I\'m fed up with the way you\'ve been behaving.
This isn\'t my umbrella. It\'s someone else\'s.
